page.title: 03HOME LIFE IN MARKFIELD
page.content: On Saturday I woke up about 6.30 a.m. and read for an hour. I then got up and washed, dressed and cleaned my teeth. I went downstairs and switched on the T.V. My mum came down and made some breakfast. I went to the newsagent's for a 'Blue Jeans' which I buy each week. I called for Jayne, one of my best friends, but she wasn't in.I went home and rang my friend Helen and we watched a video called 'Police Academy'at her house.I went home for lunch and about 1 p.m. Helen came round and we got dressed to go to the fete at Mercenfeld School. We were in the fancy dress parade which started at 1.30 p.m.When I got home I had a bath and washed my hair after tea. I put on the T.V.at 8.10 p.m. and watched Dynasty. Then I went to bed and read and eventually went to sleep.
